profile_summary:
As a Senior DevOps Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience, I excel in cloud services such as **Azure** and have hands-on expertise with **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, **Bicep**, and **GitOps** methodologies. My background in setting up CI/CD pipelines and utilizing tools like **Grafana**, **Prometheus**, and **Azure Monitor** allows me to optimize deployment processes and ensure real-time system monitoring. I am adept in **DevSecOps** practices, maintaining security standards while facilitating infrastructure as code using **vStack** and automation tools.

Furthermore, my experience as a Full Stack Developer has equipped me with extensive knowledge in **Python**, scripting with **Bash** and **PowerShell**, and effective communication within Agile teams. I have successfully developed high-performance solutions in various sectors, including healthcare and finance, leveraging frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI**. Throughout my career, I have demonstrated a strong ability to integrate modern technologies while adhering to compliance standards and implementing robust application architectures.
